entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 late this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
